meanings.definition: Soft, moist, slippery earth or mud.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, the ground turned into slimes, making it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: The hiker's boots got stuck in the slimes along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time playing in the slimes at the edge of the pond.
meanings.sent4: The slimes oozed between my toes as I walked through the marsh.
meanings.sent5: The slimes squished under my weight as I stepped on them.

meanings.sent1: The chef used slimes of honey to sweeten the dessert.
meanings.sent2: The factory released toxic slimes into the river, causing pollution.
meanings.sent3: The slimes dripped slowly from the container, forming a sticky puddle on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The slimes of glue held the pieces of the model airplane together.
meanings.sent5: The slimes coated the surface, making it difficult to clean.
